alert.note: Alert for McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 12:10AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of McPherson County through 1245 AM CDT... At 1210 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Gypsum to near Canton to Galva to near Mcpherson to 5 miles southeast of Windom. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Moundridge, Inman, Galva, Canton, Marquette, Windom, Mcpherson Airport and Roxbury. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 43 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
